author: mmusich
body:
To address https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/48603.
Needed for https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48662.

Update includes:  
 - `Run3ScoutingEBRecHit` (version 3)
 - `Run3ScoutingEERecHit` (version 3)
 - `Run3ScoutingHBHERecHit` (version 3)
title: Add data files for update of Scouting dataformats in `CMSSW_15_1_0_pre5`
